description: Manage identities of an Azure IoT hub.

commands.name: az iot hub identity assign
commands.summary: Assign managed identities to an IoT Hub.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub identity assign [--ids]
                           [--name]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--role]
                           [--scopes]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--system {false, true}]
                           [--user]
examples: az iot hub identity assign --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-assigned {resourceId1} {resourceId2}
az iot hub identity assign --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup --system-assigned --role "Storage Blob Data Contributor" --scopes {resourceId}

commands.name: az iot hub identity remove
commands.summary: Remove managed identities from an IoT Hub.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub identity remove [--ids]
                           [--name]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--system {false, true}]
                           [--user]
examples: az iot hub identity remove --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-assigned {resourceId}
az iot hub identity remove --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup --system-assigned
az iot hub identity remove --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup --system-assigned --user-assigned

commands.name: az iot hub identity show
commands.summary: Show the identity properties of an IoT Hub.
examples: az iot hub identity show --name MyIoTHub --resource-group MyResourceGroup
